title: Level 6 and 7 tokens awarded in ARAM?
body: As the title says. Just got S- in game while on level 5 veig but no token awarded.

replies.body: For whatever arbitrary reason, Champion Mastery tokens are exclusive to normal and ranked classic Summoner's Rift matches.

Not quite arbitrary, but the main reason is that mode isn't very much like the normal Summoners Rift. Mastery tokens are made to showcase your overall skill with that champion in the normal game modes, and since ARAM is played almost entirely different, you don't get tokens there. Also, maybe a little because it's random.
